text: Tsai Ming-kai (; born 6 April 1950, in Taiwan) is a Taiwanese entrepreneur, currently Chairman of MediaTek."蔡明介 (Mr. Ming-Kai Tsai)""蔡明介" In 2014, according to Forbes he was ranked 20th Taiwanese by net worth ($1.80 billion). In 2014 he was 21st in the "Best-Performing CEOs in the World" ranking by Harvard Business Review.The Best-Performing CEOs in the World In 2016 he received the Morris Chang Exemplary Leadership Award for pioneering the Taiwan semiconductor design industry.DR. MORRIS CHANG EXEMPLARY LEADERSHIP AWARD WINNER ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Taiwanese billionaires Category:Taiwanese businesspeople
title: Tsai Ming-kai
